Sports Venue Weather Download app

Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 10, 2024

Overview

Sports Venue Weather is a Progressive Web App that provides weather information for football and soccer stadiums, as well as MLB ballparks. We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about our data practices.

Limited Use

  • All data is used solely for providing weather information for football and soccer stadiums, as well as baseball ballparks.
  • We do not sell, rent, trade, or transfer any user data to third parties
  • Data collection is limited to only what is necessary for the extension's core functionality
  • No advertising or marketing use of any collected data

Use of Permissions

Our extension requires minimal permissions to function:

  • Storage Permission: Used only to save your preferences locally
  • Host Permission (stadiumweather.app): Required only for secure weather data retrieval

Data Collection

Our extension collects and stores the following information locally on your device:

  • User preferences (temperature units and dark mode settings)
  • Temporary weather data cache for offline functionality

Note: No personal information is collected or stored.

Contact

For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to request information about our data practices, please contact us at:
